itunes:title: MAR 14 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 19 UPDATE
title: MAR 14 2022 - WAR IN UKRAINE - DAY 19 UPDATE
description:
Updates on Ukraine and the Russian offensive campaign assessment reveal that Russian forces secured new terrain in Donetsk and Luhansk Oblasts. In a recent speech President Zelensky urges foreign fighters to sign indefinite contracts, and several are deserting as a result. President Biden’s executive order on crypto assets is the roadmap for the future of finance, and Florida’s ‘anti-grooming law’ passed, protecting children and parents from educators who attempt to push gender identity subjects in the classroom.
Here’s your Daily dose of Human Events with @JackPosobiec 

To get 15% off your first order of Field of Greens go to http://www.brickhouseposo.com and use code POSO

To save on MyPillow go to http://www.MyPillow.com/POSO and use code POSO
content:encoded:
Updates on Ukraine and the Russian offensive campaign assessment reveal that Russian forces secured new terrain in Donetsk and Luhansk Oblasts. In a recent speech President Zelensky urges foreign fighters to sign indefinite contracts, and several are deserting as a result.
